issue.title: 4.3 extraction interface exposes manual products if provider has manual and auto in the same order
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

4.3 extraction interface exposes manual products if provider has manual and auto in the same order
- check is done only at order level
- if at least one product is in "auto" mining then all products are exposed (including manual mining)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
